fields.summary: MobileWeb: Unable to launch mobileweb projects in Android Emulator

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
The following steps currently happen in the studio 

1. Start the emulator 
2. Do a mobile web build using the CLI 
3. Start a web server 
4. Call into a python script to check if the device is ready 
5. Wipe the browser cache 
6. Launch the browser process using the adb 

We propose moving all the steps 1 through 6 into a CLI command to build and launch mobile web projects for preview in an emulator
fields.summary: Add mobile web preview launch functionality to CLI

comments.body: Closing as "Won't Fix" as MobileWeb has been deprecated.
